content_html: Bharatpur, Sept 22: The one-way traffic along the Narayanghat-Muglin road, which was closed since last night, resumed from 5:00 in the morning today. The road section was blocked from 9:00 pm yesterday to 5:00 am this morning due to a massive landslide near Tuyinkhola in Ichhakamana Rural Municipalit

title: One-way traffic resumes along Muglin-Narayanghat road section
